content.name: Gail Kim and Molly Holly
content.value: They cannot pack cards with a restriction for one member, such as "Cannot be packed by Gail Kim."

content.name: Shane O' Mac
content.value: ERRATA: This Superstar is now a Throwback card, since a card already existed in Raw Deal with the same name.

content.name: The Largest Athlete In Sports Entertainment
content.value: ERRATA: The Ability now begins with: "You cannot pack High Risk maneuvers. Your non-Multi Strike, Grapple, and Submission maneuvers played from your hand are F:0."

content.name: Revolution Tommy Dreamer
content.value: ERRATA: The Ability now begins with: "Once during each of your turns..."

content.name: Back Body Drop (Throwback)
content.value: The previous errata for this card has been removed, it now functions as printed.

content.name: Booby Trap (Throwback)
content.value: ERRATA: Fixing a printing error, this card is now F: 0.

content.name: Collegiate Champions
content.value: ERRATA: The second paragraph of this card now reads: "ACE: When this card is in your Ring area, once during each of your turns you may discard 3 cards, and then look at your opponent's hand, choose 1 card, and he discards the chosen card."

content.name: It's Great to Be Back Here In
content.value: If a card has a situational reversal restriction, such as German Suplex (TB), this card will only be an applicable reversal if that restriction is in effect, based on the Potentiality Rule.

content.name: JYD's Chain
content.value: When JYD's Chain is in the Ringside, the player is required to pick up a Grapple maneuver to pick up Chain. NOTE: This is a reversal of a previous ruling.

content.name: Mental Acumen
content.value: If this card and Backstage Politics are in the same Ring area, the ACE of Acumen can still be reversed. Only the card being played gains protection. NOTE: This is a reversal of a previous ruling.

content.name: Pay-Per-View Main Event
content.value: The played activating this card must choose exactly 8 cards. NOTE: This is a reversal of a previous ruling.

content.name: Sustained Damage
content.value: You cannot Activate Sustained Damage in response to cards that deal no damage, whether due to a modification, because they resolve to a zone other than the Ring, or because their text states that they deal no damage.

content.name: Technical Drop Kick
content.value: ERRATA: The following text is added to the card: "When successfully played, you cannot play Technical Drop Kick as an Action for the rest of this turn."

content.name: Revolution Death-Defying Maniac
content.value: ERRATA: After the Requirement text, this card now reads: "If this card reverses from Arsenal: put this card into your Ring and if you have 3 or more Superstar-specifics from "ECW Originals" Faction Members and/or cards with "ECW Originals" in the text in your Ring, you may discard 1 Reversal: put up to 1 Pre-match Event from his Ring into his Ringside and end his turn."

content.name: Revolution Full Nelson Slam
content.value: ERRATA: The card text now reads: "During your turn, if this card is in your Ringside, you may overturn 4 cards: play this card from your Ringside."

content.name: Revolution John Cena Is In My Corner!
content.value: ERRATA: Fixing a printing error, this card is a Pre-match: Corner instead.

content.name: Revolution Live Fast - Fight Hard
content.value: ERRATA: This card is now F: 5 and the first paragraph (after the Requirement text) now instead reads: "At least 5 Less Fortitude: -5F.Your next card this turn is -15F."
